document_data.name: Azun
document_data.Location: The town was found along the western shore of [[Azulduth]], the Lake of Salt, in [[southeast Faer√ªn]].
document_data.History: Azun served as a waystop for caravans traveling between the [[Council Hills]] to [[Durpar]] and the [[Shining Lands]]. Plenty of merchants from Durpar also passed through the town on their way toward the lands along the coast of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Activities: Many of Azun's residents earned a living by fishing the Lake of Salt and mining the salt flats nearby.
